channel.title: Business on UNIQsandbox | Architecture of Logic
channel.description: Recent content in Business on UNIQsandbox | Architecture of Logic

item.title: ['Trends of 2026: Survival of the Tangible ', ' Business Trends ', ' Looking at 2026 trends, services without substance will vanish. Only facility-based industries or professions with philosophical and symbolic value will survive. Brand value comes from morality; false messages no longer work. [1], [2] ']
item.description: [’ Looking at 2026 trends, services without substance will vanish. Only facility-based industries or professions with philosophical and symbolic value will survive. Brand value comes from morality; false messages no longer work. ‘, ‘1], [2]\n’]

item.title: ['AI Strategy: Curation over Creation ', ' AI Trends ', ' AI reads patterns, not just text. In the future, content creation will be about 'curation' and 'questions' rather than raw generation. The one who asks the best questions will lead. [3], [13] ']
item.description: [’ AI reads patterns, not just text. In the future, content creation will be about “curation” and “questions” rather than raw generation. The one who asks the best questions will lead. ‘, ‘3], [13]\n’]

item.title: ['Zero Click Era ', ' 2026 Trend ', ' The 'Zero Click' era is coming. Users want answers without clicking. Your content must be optimized for AI summaries and direct answers. [2] ']
item.description: [’ The “Zero Click” era is coming. Users want answers without clicking. Your content must be optimized for AI summaries and direct answers. ‘, ‘2]\n’]

item.title: ['Be a buying agent ', ' Business Mind ', ' Like Trader Joe's, act as an agent for your customers, not just a seller. This mindset shifts how you select and present your value. [4] ']
item.description: [" Like Trader Joe’s, act as an agent for your customers, not just a seller. This mindset shifts how you select and present your value. “, ‘4]\n’]
